ssot__ContactPointApp__dlm.name: Contact Point App
ssot__ContactPointApp__dlm.description: The Contact Point App DMO represents the software application of a party on a specific device.

ssot__ActiveFromDate__c.description: The date the app is active.

ssot__ActiveToDate__c.description: The date the app is inactive.

ssot__ApplicationLoginId__c.description: The unique ID used to log in to the application.

ssot__AssetTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of asset on which the application is present.

ssot__BestTimeToContactEndTime__c.description: A contact’s preferred date and time to stop receiving communications.

ssot__BestTimeToContactStartTime__c.description: A contact’s preferred date and time to start receiving communication.

ssot__BestTimeToContactTimezoneId__c.description: A reference ID to the contact’s preferred time zone.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the contact point app DMO.

ssot__ContactPointTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of contact.

ssot__CookieIdtext__c.description: An identifier that is specific to a cookie generated in a web browser for a particular application.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeviceId__c.description: A unique ID of a device.

ssot__DeviceEndPointId__c.description: The ID for the device’s end point.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__ForBusinessUse__c.description: An indicator if the app is used for business use.

ssot__ForPersonalUse__c.description: An indicator if the app is used for personal use.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsActive__c.description: An indicator if the app is active.

ssot__IsUndeliverable__c.description: An indicator if the app is undeliverable.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group. :::tip This ID is the same as the one used in the individual object.:::

ssot__PartyRoleId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated party role, for example, a customer, supplier, or competitor.

ssot__PrimaryFlag__c.description: An indicator if the phone number is the primary phone number of the individual or account.

ssot__ProfileFirstCreatedDate___c.description: The date the profile was created.

ssot__ProfileLastUpdatedDate__c.description: The date the profile was last updated.

ssot__SoftwareApplicationId__c.description: The reference ID to the application the contact point represents.

ssot__TimezoneCode__c.description: A single-character code indicating the time zone's relationship to Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).
